title: Christmas ice cream bombe
ingredients: ['50g toasted almonds', '45g mixed peel', '60g chopped raisins', '60g sultanas', '60g currants', '75ml rum', '1 litre good quality vanilla ice cream', '100g red and green glace cherries, quartered', '1 teaspoon mixed spice', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 litre chocolate ice cream']
